sect1.title: 云计算概述
sect1.para:
Webtop is a cross-browser Web UI framework for building rich, web-based applications. It composed by two parts, server context based on Spring Framework and client side javascript library built on Sencha's Ext javascript Library. Webtop provides:
Rich set of widgets (based on Sencha's Ext Javascript Library i.e. ext JS)
Support of multiple view modes & Navigation menus, etc
Local UI intercommunication, Server Push
Remoting (service invocation)
Support of reusable modules, Plug-ins
Security integration, Internationalization
JMX support (for administration) With benifits from Spring Framework, Webtop server context could easily adopt business service and client-server remoting technologies, such as DWR and Restlet. So that on the client side, extJS UI widget could easily invoke remote service with supports provided by Webtop javascript library.
Architecture

sect2.title: 云计算对于终端用户的影响
sect2.para: The core of Sencha's Javascript Library, Ext JS, is an object-oriented JavaScript framework. Is makes Java developer's study life easier. For Spring Framework, it's not necessary to introduce more. With Webtop, the communication between client and server become easy and unified. Developer just need to register his POJO to Webtop then it could be used by UI dumped to client at runtime and he can put more efforts to build business service.

sect2.title: 云计算对于软件开发的影响

listitem.para: Client Environment Requirement Grade-A Browsers (IE6+, FireFox2+, Chrome, Safari)
Server Environment Requirement Java 1.5+, Servlet specifications 2.4 (2.5 if NIO required)
Development Environment Requirement Java 1.5+, Apache Maven 2.2.x
